content: This is a fantastic piece. I’ve never read anything that captures the psychology of the Philly sports writing scene so perfectly. Good job, JG. However, how long until everyone notices these guys come off as entitled jerks? Oh, and that little niggling thing about the “villians” of the story being a young male professional and seasoned female professional vs. the faultless sports writing fraternity guys. I’m all for the protection of the Fourth Estate, unfortunately, I’m not sure that’s the story thread that comes through in this account. And yeah, the Eagles PR department really should have commented by now. Unless of course they were hoping that the sports writers would just keep talking and get everyone on the Eagles side.
